0.text: It's your first visit! Don't worry, I'll explain everything to you.

1.text: My name is Outchie, I made this place! How do you want me to call you?

2.text:
Every day, you will receive a card like this. It allows you to record the intensity of your symptoms. 
 Fill it out and send it to try it out.

3.text:
To customize your own card, I need to know what are your chronic symptoms. 
Select them in the list below.

4.text: I also need to know if you have already been diagnosed with a pathology.

5.text: You will also receive this card, which allows you to record your lifestyle and environment. Click on the emojis to fill it out and send it!

6.text:
These 2 cards help us find links between your symptoms and your lifestyle to offer you personalized routines. It's important to fill them out regularly. 
 Would you like me to send you a notification to remind you?

7.text: The first results may take some time to arrive. But we have planned many features to keep you motivated! Take a look at the navigation bar to explore everything!

profile.documentDesc: Those are documents you uploaded in the App. They are usefull to validate the information you gave us, or to remember something. We do not share those with anybody.

profile.findMedicationName: Or choose one of your recorded medication

role.title: Role
role.document: If you are a patient, you can upload here a document to prove it (medical certificate, prescription, etc.). It will help us to validate your profile.

serieBadge.title: Current Serie
serieBadge.help:
This badge show you how many days in a row you fulfilled your Daily Checkup. 
 
 Once you fulfilled your profile, for each week, you won a bonus of 1% on all your reward with a max of 10%

productTour.text1: Now you will receive your first Daily Checkup. For each symptom, inform the intensity of the symptom on a scale from 0 to 5.
productTour.text3: Now that you fulfill you daily checkup, you got reward! You can see them in the top bar. You also increase your max serie. If you forgot to fulfill your daily checkup, it will go back to 0.
productTour.text4: Do you want me to send you reminder for your daily checkup?
productTour.text5: You can now go on the Routine page to see all routine made for you!
